lectures.Title: Introduction to Rust
lectures.Comment: Today we cover Rust introduction, installation and 'Hello world' demo.

lectures.Title: Rust Basics
lectures.Comment: Today we cover variables, mutability, datatypes, control flow and functions.

lectures.Title: Compound Data Types
lectures.Comment: Today we cover tuple, arrays, vectors, Option and Result.

lectures.Title: Enums and Matching
lectures.Comment: Today we cover match, enums, Option and Result.

lectures.Title: Introduction to Ownership
lectures.Comment: Today we cover stack/heap, ownership basic, scope, clone.

lectures.Title: Borrowing
lectures.Comment: Today we cover borrowing, mutable/immutable references etc.

lectures.Title: Slice Types
lectures.Comment: Today we cover Slices and Strings.
